# Quantile map of LEB

This map shows the quantile of level $\alpha \in \{0, 1 \}$ of the predictive distribution of LEB at each pixel on a  250 by 250 metres regular grid. 

* **Quantile level:**
The level $\alpha \in \{0, 1 \}$ of the quantile surface. The user can change the level of alpha.
